acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU CRAVE THE KNOWLEDGE OF TRUTH AND NEED FREEDOM TO EXPLORE
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU CRAVE THE KNOWLEDGE OF TRUTH AND NEED FREEDOM TO EXPLORE

{FIRSTNAME}, I can sense your free soul…

You truly love to explore and find deep answers.

And your vibration is quite curious and likes to see below the surface, hunting for hidden gems of wisdom… to find the juicy truth.

Freedom is a key word… you don’t like to feel caged in, by people, places or rules.

But… you love social interaction and easily make friends.

And a free soul truly thrives on space and is drawn towards the magic of unknown realms...

Whether that's about growing your own veggies on the fire escape, discovering the customs in far flung land, or anything else on the road less travelled.

Although freedom may suggest unreliability, you're loyal and responsible to the core.

And something tells me you’d move mountains with the strength of a goddess... for any cause that touches your heart.

Your soul expresses creativity through art or storytelling... passing its wisdom to those ready to see, listen, and be uplifted.

You can easily get distracted by all the inspiration around you, resulting in scattered energy and unfocused action…

But... you’ve always felt you were called to discover the beauty of the unknown and have been looking for signs throughout your life that guide you there.

And I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward fulfilling your destiny now.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
IF YOU WANT THE MOST OUT OF LIFE, YOU MUST LOOK IN THE SHADOWS…

Your energy is deeply honest and open, complimenting your curious soul… ready to flow freely.

But... I sense something blocking its flow...

Negative emotions left by bad experiences still stand in your path… despite all the growth you've been through…

It’s incredibly hard to raise your frequency, allow the natural flow of energy, and discover deeper truths... if hidden shadows of the past still stand in your path.

The real nuggets of truth and wisdom will only be found if you FOCUS on the shadows...

You can already reflect on your feelings and know there are many layers to the “onion of self”…

I also sense that this is a very critical time on your path, {FIRSTNAME}.

The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

The way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free, but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

You’re ready for an awakening…

When you open your beautiful mind and heart to explore your inner world… all shadows will be banished.

Raising your vibration...

And your soul will connect to something truly magical.

Revealing the secrets of the Universe in blissful light…

This will provide the spiritual and material freedom you crave.
